entry.title: Tuesday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 13. POP 30%
